name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Glassdoor Scraper: Export Job for Glassdoor

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Glassdoor Scraper: Scrape Glassdoor job postings to CSV/EXCEL/JSON format easily. Download your Glassdoor jobs in just a few clicks!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Export Glassdoor job postings to CSV and Excel effortlessly with the reliable scraper tool. Take the hassle out of job searching.

HOW IT WORKS
1. Search for your desired jobs on Glassdoor.
2. Copy the search link and paste it into the extension.
3. Download the job postings in CSV or EXCEL format.
